alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:52PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Natrona County through 230 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hiland, or 40 miles east of Shoshoni, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waltman Rest Area around 155 PM MDT. Waltman around 200 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Natrona County Lower Elevations
